entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who is trying to open an egg underwater. He is described as going back into the water and putting his head under the surface.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: A person who is helping Harry and seems to be enjoying bossing him around. She tells Harry to put his head under the water to hear the song coming from the egg.

entities.name: egg
entities.description: An object that is being opened underwater by Harry. It produces a gurgling song when opened, and later a chorus of eerie voices singing to Harry.

relationships.description: Harry is holding the egg in his hands while trying to open it underwater. This relationship is described as Harry lowering the egg beneath the foamy surface and opening it.
Harry is interacting with Myrtle, who is helping him and bossing him around. This relationship is described as Myrtle telling Harry to put his head under the water.
